info.name: Google Inbox Background Image (moved)
info.description:
This is moved to my other account: https://userstyles.org/styles/149002/google-inbox-image-background

This puts a background image of your choosing on Google Inbox. It also makes the sidebars and content previews transparent, like Gmail.
info.additionalInfo: v1.1: Right padding on headings fixed.

data.title: When i scroll down the image ends and the background is white
